医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究探讨了父母与孩子贪吃行为的斗争研究调查了家长在喂养学龄前儿童狂热饮食行为方面的经验和挑战，强调了培养健康饮食习惯和预防肥胖的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Study-explores-parents-struggle-with-childrens-avid-eating-behaviors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Study-explores-parents-struggle-with-childrens-avid-eating-behaviors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb1974d6-7e62-47ed-a028-891e6c0be6fb Wed, 24 Apr 2024 00:51:00 -0400 Study explores parents' struggle with children's avid eating behaviors
全球变暖加剧中风风险：研究将温度波动与全球中风负担上升联系起来研究发现，2019 年，非最佳气温导致全球超过 50 万中风死亡，揭示了不同地区和人口群体因气温而导致的中风负担存在显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Global-warming-intensizes-中风-风险-Study-links-温度-swings-to-rising-中风-burden-worldwide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Global-warming-intensizes-中风-风险-Study-links-温度-swings-to-rising-中风-burden-worldwide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0287d579-10c7-4c78-8e6c-894755e07277 Wed, 24 Apr 2024 00:35:00 -0400 Global warming intensifies stroke risk: Study links temperature swings to rising stroke burden worldwide
重新利用鼻腔抗生素新霉素在预防和治疗呼吸道病毒感染方面显示出希望在小鼠模型中鼻内给予硫酸新霉素，通过诱导干扰素刺激基因 (ISG) 表达，不依赖微生物群和干扰素激活，有望成为针对甲型流感和 SARS-CoV-2 等呼吸道病毒的预防和治疗剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Re Purposed-nasal-antibiotic-neomycin-shows-promise-in-preventing-and-treating-respiratory-viral-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240424/Re Purposed-nasal-antibiotic-neomycin-shows-promise-in-preventing-and-treating-respiratory-viral-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=18661331-ab73-4acb-93c7-a1208c86d01f Wed, 24 Apr 2024 00:16:00 -0400 Repurposed nasal antibiotic neomycin shows promise in preventing and treating respiratory viral infections
研究发现，大脑动态和体重指数与节食成功有关研究表明，BMI 较高且在饮食决策过程中大脑发生广泛改变的个体往往在饮食调整方面的成功率较低，这表明神经可塑性和 BMI 对饮食依从性的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Brain-dynamics-and-BMI-linked-to-dieting-success-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Brain-dynamics-and-BMI-linked-to-dieting-success-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c3980a9-b570-46b1-826d-ccdf50aa2af6 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 22:31:00 -0400 Brain dynamics and BMI linked to dieting success, study finds
研究强调营养疗法有效控制妊娠糖尿病的潜力研究调查了医学营养疗法对妊娠期糖尿病的影响，强调了特定饮食模式和营养补充剂在有效控制这种疾病方面的有益作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Study-highlights-nutrition-therapys-potential-to-manage-gestational-diabetes- effectively.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Study-highlights-nutrition-therapys-potential-to-manage-gestational-diabetes- effectively.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a026aeb2-782f-4459-b28e-c6620b2ec0aa Tue, 23 Apr 2024 21:22:00 -0400 Study highlights nutrition therapy's potential to manage gestational diabetes effectively
全球研究显示 COVID-19 治疗指南与 WHO 标准不匹配研究评估了世卫组织成员国之间的 COVID-19 管理指南的全球差异，发现许多国家指南并不完全符合世卫组织的建议，特别是在资源匮乏的国家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Global-study-reveals-mismatch-in-COVID-19-treatment-guidelines-with-WHO-standards.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Global-study-reveals-mismatch-in-COVID-19-treatment-guidelines-with-WHO-standards.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=967cb267-97e5-4623-93ab-d5fc6dfaa610 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 21:11:00 -0400 Global study reveals mismatch in COVID-19 treatment guidelines with WHO standards
调查显示印度代谢疾病呈上升趋势研究显示，印度非传染性代谢疾病的发病率很高，城乡地区以及印度不同邦之间的患病率存在​​显着差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Survey-unveils-Indias-rising-tide-of-metabolic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Survey-unveils-Indias-rising-tide-of-metabolic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7cef20b4-fb32-404c-9​​7d8-e8c2acd6f794 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 21:00:00 -0400 Survey unveils India's rising tide of metabolic diseases
分析发现各国 COVID-19 治疗建议存在显着差异开放获取期刊 BMJ 上发表的一项比较分析发现，世界各地治疗 COVID-19 的国家临床指南差异很大，资源贫乏的国家最有可能偏离黄金标准（世界卫生组织；WHO）的治疗建议全球健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Analysis-finds-significant-variations-in-national-COVID-19-treatment-recommendations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Analysis-finds-significant-variations-in-national-COVID-19-treatment-recommendations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20524a0a-7c4a-4830-8e66-6f231d552594 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 16:02:07 -0400 Analysis finds significant variations in national COVID-19 treatment recommendations
成本成为戒烟努力的重要因素一项发表在《开放获取》上的对全国调查结果的分析发现，在英国，健康问题仍然是一半以上表示想戒烟的人的主要动机，但成本现在是超过四分之一的人的关键因素。 《BMJ 公共卫生》杂志。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Cost-becomes-a-significant-factor-in-smoking-cessation-efforts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Cost-becomes-a-significant-factor-in-smoking-cessation-efforts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ffe058e-2e48-446a-af05-ba1769f7b5cb Tue, 23 Apr 2024 15:52:31 -0400 Cost becomes a significant factor in smoking cessation efforts
审查发现现役军人与女性出生体重低的风险之间存在联系对《BMJ 军事健康》杂志在线发表的现有科学证据进行的审查表明，现役军人可能会增加女性生出低出生体重婴儿的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Review-finds-link- Between-active-military-service-and-womene28099s-risk-of-having-low-birthweight-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240423/Review-finds-link- Between-active-military-service-and-womene28099s-risk-of-having-low-birthweight-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=105c483d-8536-4ed1-9c57-9b55b334d039 Tue, 23 Apr 2024 15:48:42 -0400 Review finds link between active military service and women’s risk of having low birthweight babies
